website_summaries.verdict: Offers wide array of useful features. Water-resistance capability makes it suitable for surface water sports.
pros: Popular color that looks great in all kinds of lighting
Customers love the toughness and waterproof capabilities
Watch lasts a long time, owners say
cons: Larger watch face than some women want
Some owner complaints of glare on the watch face in sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had a grey one that lasted me several years. I have to have a watch that lights up and allows me to see what time it is during the night. I intended to get another neutral color but this champagne color is perfect. It goes really well with my skin tone and gives a little bit of color without being too bold. It’s definitely a watch I can wear everyday and everywhere so I don’t have to swap it out with another watch.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors of the watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of the watch. The band is a shimmery beige, and the face a warm peachy light rose gold pink. The only thing to keep in mind is that the face is a little like a mirror and sometimes in the light you have to manipulate the angle of the watch to see the time. When I can not see the time I sometimes push the light button on the bottom and I can see the numbers in a light green. I love the colors so much that I will put up with the mirror/visibility issue...
customer_reviews.author: S. Z.

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this from my husband on Christmas Day and I absolutely love it the shade of gold is very different than the picture but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgious sport watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It really is nice looking. I do agree that the face is hard to see in shadowed light like other reviews have stated. Under certain light, you have to move your wrist around to get direct sunlight or turn on the light. It is so nice looking though that I can forgive this issue. I wear it for work because I need an alarm to remind me of my various meetings every day. This watch has 5 alarms! I love the cat, dog, dolphin, and puffer fish too. They can be entertaining when stuck in meetings that are dragging.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. My 2nd Baby G. The color is perfect for my rose gold themed accessories. It is small, light weight, adjustable, and sporty. You can easily read the time and can also view it in different time zones. There is a light on it as well as digital characters which keep the kids entertained. It's easy to access the stop watch also and or quickly convert to military time. I love this watch and where it everyday as it blends in with most of my outfits. Although it's sporty, it's also fashionable and doesn't stand out very much which is nice when it's an everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: IRAY WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and design, a wear everywhere watch.
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfortable, looks good enough to wear with my gold or silver jewelry and even if I am dressed up for our Bible meeting or going out to dinner. The Color is more of the neutral pewter color with a bronze face .. And it Looks great on my 6"wrist. Looks pretty with my wedding ring set. Love it! Will wear while swimming. Husband set the watch to the correct time, date. (He's a nice hubby). I was worried if it would look large and , masculine. No.. it looks sophisticated to me. And not too large. Great price and bought the 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Ballard

customer_reviews.title: If your wrist is not tiny won’t fit.  .
customer_reviews.text: Watch has big face, but the band was almost too small for my wrist. Could never get the time set. Took it into a Macy’s store for them to set it because it’s extremely difficult. Was excited until I got home and realized it was set on Army time. Got tired of trying to set the time. I couldn’t see the time and don’t want to have to hit a button for a light, that’s a little inconvenient if someone asks for the time. So I returned it. Just not the watch for me. Band and was a pretty color. The numbers are just difficult to see quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love my Baby-G!
customer_reviews.text: I found myself in need of a good rough and tumble, and most importantly waterproof, watch for the summer. I had a Baby-G many moons ago and was pleased to find this one. The watch display is mirrored, which is a cool feature. It's a very pretty watch, and a good alternative to my dressier Movado watches I wear. This retailer offered a very good price and quick shipping. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very sad about this
customer_reviews.text: Very sad about this. Was so excited to receive the baby-g, love the color, love the format. I have an extremely small wrist, so it was a little big, but manageable. It's practically impossible to see. The numbers are on a mirrored surface, so in the evening, it's reflecting darkness, plus the numbers are dark = can not see what time it is. I was attempting to set the time and had to push the light button over and over. I don't have problems seeing/reading in lowlight conditions. If you only plan to use this in the light of day, you might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou N.

customer_reviews.title: Had one that worked.  Wish I could find another
customer_reviews.text: I had one that lasted several year with excellent service. Easy to read. Bought another on Amazon and returned it as the time function didn't work. Bought another at a store with the same problem and returned it too.
customer_reviews.author: Chips

customer_reviews.title: wife lov it
customer_reviews.text: watch works perfect now as i get older in life i come to see little harder even wit bifocls in use the little book they give you is a waste to set this up watch youtube video then have nieghbors 8yr old come over had 10 dollars 2 secs later work as it should lol but its perfect packaged first come in box then in metal container to keep it safe very well made would buy again
customer_reviews.author: mike dotson

customer_reviews.title: I'm a more petite woman with fairly small wrists and I love that this watch is not too overpowering looking and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch! More of a champagne color with rose gold watch face accents. Less pink in natural lighting than product photo advertised. I'm a more petite woman with fairly small wrists and I love that this watch is not too overpowering looking and that there are PLENTY of holes to adjust the band without an excessively long "tail" of material. I have tested the watching swimming several times and my job requires it be submerged in water for 3 hrs at a time! No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Galli

customer_reviews.title: Negative screen- dark and difficult to read numbers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rose gold toned watch- the face has some shiny rose gold edging. Gorgeous. I am only keeping it because it is THAT gorgeous. Screen is impossible to read 50% of the time due to the dark "negative" screen. You have to flick your wrist around to catch the light at the right angle to read the numbers. I'm going to keep it because I wanted a pretty but digital watch. if I wanted a watch I could read quickly and from any angle This definitely would not fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: A123

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but time is difficult to see
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. My first G-shock; my boyfriend loves g-shock watches so he purchased this for me. The color is as it is depicted in the image. Beautiful color. I am a woman of color and it looks nice on my skin tone. I have one issue with the design of the watch and one preference. The one issue is that the time is a bit difficult to see. I often have to use the backlight to see the time, the numbers are also small. The preference is that it has an analog and digital time.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch but not the best digital face
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the watch. But two things I didn't like so much. First, it's extremely difficult to clean dirt from under the two little white wires across the face of the watch. Second, the digital time is kind of hard to see in some lighting during the day. I actually have to use the night light feature to read the time. I think the screen reflects the light in a strange way making it hard to read it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t see the time!!
customer_reviews.text: The face of this is literally a mirror! So it is near impossible to see the time outdoors and you are constantly blinding everyone with it. Even indoors you look are the time and it is hard to see with the reflection. What were they thinking?? Also this is champagne, not silver or grey as pictures show which I was happy about. However what’s the point of a watch this expensive when you can’t even see the time??
customer_reviews.author: killer6728

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy, and chic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch since April of last year and it has held up great! It has a bumper on the face of the watch that has prevented the glass from being scratched at all. The color, champagne/pink is almost rose gold, and is super on trend and stylish. I have gotten several compliments on this watch and wear it everyday! It is totally waterproof and shows almost no signs of wear or tear after more than a year of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: PastMyPrime

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! Watch lasted a month then died! Evidently Casio ships them with dead batteries from testing the product! We changed the battery and it worked for a day! Now because we changed the battery Casio want $46 to get the watch back! The watch was only $60 to being with! My daughter is still wearing the target watch we bought her from target 6 years ago for $20! This is what I get for trying to buy her a nicer watch! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dispointed parent

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but display is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and look of the watch! Unfortunately the display is beyond awful: 1) it is too small, 2) there isn't enough contrast, and 3) there's this awful mirrored background so you have to tilt it just right to have any chance of seeing it. Bottom line, if you are buying it for the look and color, and thinking of it as more of an accessory, you will probably be fairly happy with it. Otherwise I would keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amy V

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: IMHO, G-Shock is one of the best watches made. Unfortunately, this one was difficult to read/see. I really wanted to keep it but I just couldn't use it. If you don't have problems with your vision....don't hesitate to get this watch.
customer_reviews.author: MommyHuggin

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and durable
customer_reviews.text: So durable. Have worn it daily for months with minimal wear and tear. Rose gold finish has not worn at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Same size as men's G-Force watches.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. I was hopeing it was smaller (for women), than the man-sized G-Force watches, but it's the same size as the men's G-Force, so pretty large watch face & strap, for my taste. It's clearly not a man's color though. The rose gold watch face and accents are pretty. I wish it didn't have the watch face guards, but the face IS glass after all, so I guess the guards are necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty watch.
customer_reviews.text: Color is exactly what I wanted. Looks exactly like pictures. I’m very petit and it’s the perfect size. Not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for casual
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just as pictured. Got it as an everyday watch that would stand up to water when I am with my kids. Have worn it continuously for swimming, showering, no problems! Keeps running and the color on the band has not chipped at all. Color is a pinky bronze color, looks good with a tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like I like 👍
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my other Baby G because I lost it 😟 but I just got my replacement and it's so cute I love it! The color is not quite what I expected, I thought it would be a little more on the rose side, but it still looks good against my complexion and I'm happy with it. Easy to program didn't need the manual to figure it out. My one could do without feature is the animals in the data module....what is that?! Other than that, nice watch would recommend would buy again just like I plan on rebuying the one I lost.
customer_reviews.author: Nikia N.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: The very minute I saw this watch I had to have it. The color is absolutely beautiful, and it fits perfectly. I can dress it up, or dress it down. I work in emergency services, so I am subject to get anything on myself in my twenty four hour shift. I wash my hands hundreds of times, and I don't worry because it's waterproof. I'm only giving this watch 4 stars because I just received it a few days ago. I hope this Baby G doesn't let me down, and lives up to 5
customer_reviews.author: EMSgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of my new G Shot. The quality is the same as the ones I've purchased from Nordstrom in the past. It came with instructions manual which made it a lot easier to set, something I use to have done at Nordstrom
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Unique, sporty and dressy watch.
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this watch. First of all, the look of it is great. It looks sporty but nice and dressy at the same time. I love that it has 5 daily alarms. It is water resistant. The protectors ar3 very helpful so the watch doesn't get scratched. The only thing I am not in love with is the fact that the screen can get a little dirty and it can be a little hard to cleans because the protections are in the way. Over all is a great product and it looks like is going to last for a while. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Functional at gym and acceptable at office
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Looks more feminine than the traditional black. Easy to operate. Only complaint is that because of the mirror reflection, it can be difficult to view the time at many angles. Quickly adapt to the working angles tho.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute watch! Cute little creatures pop up in the day of the week place. My husband has a G Shock watch with a feature; the watch lights up in the dark when he raises his arm to look at the time. Sadly this watch does not have that feature. The rest is great ! My daughter saw it and wanted one too. I ordered her the gray jelly baby G watch. This rose colored watch is a beautiful color. The size is nice for my small wrist. Still has that big look but in a smaller size. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BCM

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I use this watch everyday. I love the color and it's very durable. The only thing I don't like and many others have mentioned, it's hard to read in certain areas and lighting. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JZMN

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best watch I've ever had. It feels like butter on my wrist and it's easy to read. The little animals that pop up in the corner when I push the light button are a fun little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Can't see the numbers on the face
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch but.... sooo disappointed in the way you CAN'T see the face 90% of the time. I tried multiple angles and lighting situations and won't even wear it anymore due to the fact that I got so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: If you're concerned about this watch being too pink, it's not. This is a great neutral, bronzey-taupish color that matches well with the rose gold accents on the face of the watch. Of course I wouldn't be offended if it was more pink but obviously not everyone loves the color pink. It's been a good while since I've had a digital watch so it took some effort to get it set but the instructions are pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it. My 2nd Baby-G watch purchase on Amazon. I didn't have a chance to replace the battery on my 1st Baby-G watch before buying this and that watch lasted 3 yrs and 4 months! I also did a price comparison before buying online & Amazon had the best price. The watch is easy to set up. Great color against my asian skin. I wear it daily even for date nights with hubby :) Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch! My boyfriend has a g-shock watch & he introduced me to the Baby G watches. So he bought it for me as a gift & now I’m obsessed with these watches! I am a watch lover anyway, so this just made me worse lol. I love the rose gold color. As soon as I seen it, I knew this was the one I wanted! Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item. The color was not as ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. The color was not as It appears in the picture. It was in fact an insipid beige color, not at all attractive. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Almeida

customer_reviews.title: The watch is so beautiful. I can wear it in the water and ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is so beautiful. I can wear it in the water and it is dressy enough to wear out to a party. It works well and has features I don't quite understand. I will have to read the booklet
customer_reviews.author: michelle ben

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Functional. Keeps accurate time. I am a constant hand washer -- and no issues with water. However, the strap rubs the bones of my wrist, and I'm constantly pushing it up above that little bone on left left side of my wrist. I love the look and accuracy, and thus I put cushioned tape around my wrist before work, and that keeps the watch in place from sliding and protects the bony prominence of my wrist. Yes, I'd buy it again, but if you are bony or at the very least have bony wrists -- consider padded tape or a toe pad for that bony prominence.
customer_reviews.author: MsKindleReader

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, sometimes very hard to read.
customer_reviews.text: It is a gorgeous watch, love the color and features. The face is reflective and sometimes impossible to see anything on it. I had a baby-g in another color with a different face and I had no problem seeing it. But this reflective one is sometimes very difficult to make anything out on it. I would not buy this color again.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Classy elegance and practical durability
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the quality and durability. It has a flair even with dressy clothing. Goes from work and out and about. Hangs with me in the pool no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Jordan-Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Love the colour and it's easy to work. Others have mentioned about difficulty reading the time in certain light. I've occasionally had that but nothing I worry about and I just turn my wrist a little and it's not a problem. It came on time and I was happy with the price. I wear this watch 24/7 and had it a few weeks. Time will tell 😊 if it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Issy

customer_reviews.title: Different is good...
customer_reviews.text: I usually where a more traditional style silver watch but I was ready for something more sporty. The baby G has a nice sporty look while also looking classy. It is so comfortable I forget I'm wearing it. It is a little thicker than I expected but it's not a problem. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mday

customer_reviews.title: No Owners manual
customer_reviews.text: I have had many G Shocks over the years as well as given several as gifts. Now and then I get one with no manual which this one didn't have makes me skeptical of authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and chunky watch - perfect for all wrist sizes
customer_reviews.text: I receive compliments when I wear this watch - the color and size are appealing. Having owned it now for a few months, I have to admit that I'm back to looking for something that suits my needs a bit better. The information on the dial is little too small for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: twofoxes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted without the outrageous price. I needed a watch for when I go on vacation but something that's water proof. This is beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Was a bit too big for my daughter. But im thinking i want it for myself
customer_reviews.author: Jamie SW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order of the Baby G watch and I am loving it. It is a surprise birthday gift for my 10 year old daughter. The delivery timing was just right. She is gonna love it. I have a large collections of Baby G watches and no for a fact that these watches are the best. I was kind of nervous that it will not be authentic because of the discount price, but this is the real deal. And I am extremely happy that I made the purchase. Item looks exactly as shown on the web site. Fits her wrist perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kleino

customer_reviews.title: Stylish enough for daily wear, functional enough for the hospital.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my previous gshock I wore to work in the hospital and overall, I love it. Only downside I’ve found is that it can be a little difficult to read in high light situations as the face is very shiny and reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Davies

customer_reviews.title: so useful when traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Baby G watch, I buy them for the convenience of many time zones, so useful when traveling. My old one, after many years still works very well, but it was a clear plastic, now ugly yellow and dirty, impossible to clean. The new is perfect rosy beige, goes with everything. The time on it right now is one minute off, I'll see if I can fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I've had it for years and its very reliable. I like the subdued color which goes with everything. Even though I'm 24, I still get a kick out of the animal characters that flash at the top of the watch. All around good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!!!  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty watch. The color of the band and the display compliment each other so well. I love it. I just got it today so I cannot review really any of it's functionality, but it was easy to set the time/display so that's a positive first step.
customer_reviews.author: KSmith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had this watch in 2015 as a gift from a loved one and I misplaced it just last year. Bought another one because I love it so much. Very cute, goes with everything and waterproof. It was more expensive back then so I love that it was $25 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Z'hané

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. the quality is holding up well. Like other reviews have said the color in person is not as gold as the picture. But it is still really nice looking. After a few months it is getting a bit dirty and I am trying to figure out how safely clean it. I highly recommend this watch. If this review helped you click YES!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch, Dial Impossible to Read
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a beautiful watch, the numbers are impossible to read. I bought it to time intervals at the gym but I found that with the dark background and dark numbers, I had to have the exact light and perfect angle to read the dial which makes it useless to me. Even turning on the light did not help. I love the color and the features, but had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not the watch I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset that what I ordered was not what I received. I ordered the pink champagne watch with the rose gold face, but received the clear pink and white watch. Luckily, my daughter was ok with it and decided to keep it instead of returning. I had read other reviews of the same thing happening to other people that ordered this same watch. The pink and white watch is cute but NOT what I ordered. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alarms useless
customer_reviews.text: I am so pissed that this beautiful watch has a crap alarm that you can't hear. Why have 5 alarms and chimes if you can't hear them?
customer_reviews.author: xf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Even nicer than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why all these reviewers are struggling with setting up the watch- It was a very simple couple of steps. I love this watch! It had been on my wish list for some time after seeing one on a friend. I finally got it as an anniversary gift and it is much prettier in person. As others have stated, it is not pink. It is a champagne color with a coppery face. I think it is really pretty and much more likely to go with different outfits than it would if it were a pink watch. Overall, truly awesome watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Color is great. Functions are very nice. Only problem is the face has a reflective surface and the time is hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: DDuncan3

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this watch and it's special extra nightlight feature!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the color is more champagne, beige, but a bit of shimmer. It is a gorgeous color. The face plate is more rose gold. I love it. Best feature I didn't know about before purchasing......when you use nightlight feature there are digital animals that appear in the day of the week window!! A swimming dolphin. Silly blowfish. Puppy running. A kitty playing. I am in love with this watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very pink
customer_reviews.text: The color was more pink than I like. The band is a translucent pink and looks cheap. It will work for what I need it for- outdoor Activities.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H. Koziol

customer_reviews.title: Love the color -- quite unique and goes with everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the color -- quite unique and goes with everything -- and the watchband is more comfortable than you might think -- silky smooth feeling. The only downsides: I find the time hard to read (small window requires me to put on my reading glasses to see unless i'm in bright light or unless i'm in the dark and use the back-light feature). Also, i was excited that i could set up the watch initially myself but i'm not enamored of the fact that in order to display central time, Chicago is the city name that appears in the upper window; i can probably change to my hometown but i haven't figured out how without more research.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: wonder watch
customer_reviews.text: love this watch... as a nurse you need a waterproof watch and this watch is what your looking for
customer_reviews.author: rebecca poston

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is water proof and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch since 2014 and it is stilll running strong. I love that it is water proof and comfortable. It is a little worn because I have worn it a lot over the years. I keep it in my gym bag now and it is my go to gym watch! Tempted to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Bought it in part based on good reviews. Was not disappointed. Have always loved G-Shock & Baby-G - but this model exceeded my expectations. I purchased as a bang-around watch to wear when I am doing chores or playing with kids. This model is really cute for a Baby-G - looks better in person than in the pictures online. I was disappointed when I lost my last Baby-G & could not find the same style again. But after buying this one, I am more than pleased. It's super cute! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love the color hard to read not for people with poor sight.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this watch. I bought it for her when school started and it is holding up well. It's easy to read the time. She has received many compliments on the rose gold color.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral color watch!  I love for nursing!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch! There are a few pros and cons, but overall only watch I could find in a nice neutral color! Pros The color is awesome Easy to change the city to see different time zones Easy to see time in the dark Cons Face of watch is small for the size of the watch Has protective bars across the top and bottom, which I think makes the time harder to see unless you can look straight down in to the face. The light up button is in a weird place
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMay2502

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, such an elegant design and very durable. I've banged this watch around so many times and if definitely holds up, I am able to wear this without having to worry I'll damage it yet know I still have a cute watch on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was bummed as it is a pretty watch.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sending this back as the face was too hard for me to read. I am an ED RN and I could not count on being able to see the seconds when I needed to. I was bummed as it is a pretty watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: Looking at Time through Rose-Colored Watch
customer_reviews.text: Fun nifty watch with cute features. When pressing the backlight, animals swim and move on the display. A random little animation! I wish I could change the date to the American format (mm/dd/yy instead of yy/mm/dd) but it's a minor inconvenience. Alarm is not very loud... not loud enough to wake me.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: This watch has all you'll need!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work, love it! It lights up and is perfect for when I'm on scene of an accident and need the time. I love the rose gold color, the day/date, alarm, timer and set up are great! Love how easy it is to switch from normal time to military time. I've worn it in the shower many times and don't have any issues with it... You will love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear or see
customer_reviews.text: This watch is attractive and has all the features I wanted - but anything you read about the face being hard to see is TRUE. And one of the big reasons I bought it was for alarms but I don't hear them unless I have the watch up to my ear and no one around me could hear it either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rose gold watch!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears her watch everyday! She loves the color and the size!
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Great quality gshock, wife used for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Gshock is a great quality for the price, a little more champagne than pink but a good color
customer_reviews.author: cavaliersam

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought from a Gift List receiver likes a lot. RK
customer_reviews.author: Ronald  Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, hate the color. advertised as "rose gold", but it looks like a muted gold. Watch face is beautiful. Watch itself is well-made and well designed. Would like vibrating alarm option so others are not disturbed by it - this would also help those who are hearing impaired. Still would have kept this watch if the color was rose gold like iPhone and Landstrom's jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as pink as I thought it would be but that being said it is very pretty. Being a kid at heart my favorite part is the little animation that comes on when you turn the light on. I have a very tiny wrist and I like big watches but this is not a huge watch. If the watch were smaller it wouldn't be functional and if it were larger it might be to bulky.
customer_reviews.author: D B-Henry

customer_reviews.title: Toooo Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Never thought I'd buy a watch on Amazon, but glad I did. I am not much of a fan of the sporty look, but this is both sporty and girly at the same time. This watch has so many features. You can even save contact numbers on the watch! It has cute animals, like puppies and cats that scroll across the small upper screen. It lights up in a green glow and does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy in the Sky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The shiney face is a little hard to read, but really I don't see well anyway. Love the little animals that live inside.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Burge

customer_reviews.title: Not that visible
customer_reviews.text: The screen it’s a little dark so it may be hard sometimes to read the hour, and it’s sometimes difficult to change the settings
customer_reviews.author: Yoshara Valdez

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Talk about blast from the past. I'm 28 and remember having one in the 90's. I love the rose gold spin which makes it seem more adult/recent. I would recommend this watch forsure. It is kind of a rose gold but also a tannish color. I like it though
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Baby-G and I absolutely love it! The color is gorgeous and the functionality is spot-on. It goes with casual wear and also dresses up nicely as well. It can be tricky to read in certain light but I haven't found it bothersome at all. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: whiteisle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality....original...little bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and durability... great gift for women but little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Shamel Mohamed Soaida

customer_reviews.title: I love the different time zones
customer_reviews.text: I've previously had this watch before. I lost it and had to replace it. I love the different time zones. The color is also universally flattering with its rose gold accents. A great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: c_jordan

customer_reviews.title: Metallic face makes time hard to read!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful, and the time and date is exactly how I wanted it. The problem is the digital face is metallic and the watch has to be angled just correctly to be able to read it. I am a nurse and don't have the time to move my arm around to catch the correct lighting. The time is easy to read when you press the backlight button.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend! She loves it and wears it every day, basically never comes off. The color is very nice, not near as bright and pink in the images, but just enough to look professional and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Casio-Baby-G
customer_reviews.text: This watch is just as described. I had no trouble setting it as I have worn Casio before. My wrist is 71/2 " and I have the band on the 6 hole from the end. The color is as pictured on Amazon and is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: I think this watch is better looking than the picture and it is so lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this watch is better looking than the picture and it is so lightweight that I forget I'm wearing it. I have a small wrist and it looks large on me, but as I said it is light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: My wife is in love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my wife who works in a stockroom so it needed to be tough, and this watch is more than perfect! I'm sure it will last her for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Caden

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice work watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this watch, it is a great watch, I don't like that even in the day I can't see the time
customer_reviews.author: gayosa jackson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to Look At, but Settings are Difficult
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this watch. I've worn it and it presents well, even on my tiny wrist. I want to use it for travel. However, I've been working for days to set the day and year. I've watched tutorials on You Tube. I'll continue to try.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Super cute watch
customer_reviews.text: Super cute watch. As typical, Baby G is hard to beat. The color is great. All the functions work properly. I love these watches. this is my 3rd to order and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda C

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to make your other watches JEALOUS....
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch SO MUCH, suspect my other casio watches will become jealous. The color is magnificent 'Champ-beige' is what i'd call it. I have medium tone skin and the watch appears stunning while being a neutral color. Have not taken it off since I got it. Lightweight and easy to set. Unlike my metal-banded casios this does not snag your hair during styling, etc. Adorable animations and multiple alarm settings FTW!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine @ BT

customer_reviews.title: I’m very disappointed. The picture of the watch looked like the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. The picture of the watch looked like the watch band closely matched the watch bezel. It doesn’t. It’s pink which makes it look like a girl’s sport watch instead of something a little more dressy. I can’t comment on the mechanical aspect of the watch yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Color...Neat Features
customer_reviews.text: This watch is such a unique color. I adore it! I'm a nurse and the ability of this watch to read military time is very helpful. A cute little bonus: when you press the button to activate the backlight, a random character appears in the top left corner. I have no negatives to share about this watch. Great watch!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Young

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch color!
customer_reviews.text: My watch arrived today- perfect 2 day shipping. I'm a bit of a watch nut and I really like the look of this one. The color is unusual and the design is cool. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Not really a good choice for the work place if you need the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really a good choice for the work place if you need the date and time quickly. The digital information is just too small . Looks good so I will use it as a fashion piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. However in certain light the numbers are hard to read, even with light on. A lot larger than I hoped for in a ladies watch, but guess that is the style. Setting time and date was fairly easy, haven't been able to get the alarms yet..
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it at first. But the color started to wear off within a few months.
customer_reviews.author: vicyeo

product_meta.title: Casio Women's BG169G-4 Baby G Pink Champagne Watch
product_meta.description:
Digital dial. Beige resin case with a beige resin band. Quartz movement. 200 meters / 660 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel. Scratch Resistant Mineral crystal. Solid caseback. Tang clasp. Case size 42 mm x 14 mm. Band 20 mm x long. Casio BG169G-4CR Baby-G Watch.



CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.9 x 4.2 x 3.4 inches; 4.16 Ounces
 * Item model number :BG169G-4
 * Department :Female
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :May 2, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Casio
 * ASIN :B008XDC1NU

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #455 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars760 ratings Digital dial. Beige resin case with a beige resin band. Quartz movement. 200 meters / 660 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel. Scratch Resistant Mineral crystal. Solid caseback. Tang clasp. Case size 42 mm x 14 mm. Band 20 mm x long. Casio BG169G-4CR Baby-G Watch.



CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.
feature_bullets: Glittering digital watch featuring multiple functions such as shock resistance, EL backlight, tele-memo (25 records), world time (29 time zones/30 cities), day counter, five daily alarms, 1/100th-second stopwatch, countdown timer, 12/24-hour format, and mute function
42-mm resin case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with digital display
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving
